prerequisite.name: Check for valid AROpen Doc Dates
prerequisite.query: SELECT COUNT(aropen_docdate)=0 FROM aropen WHERE (aropen_docdate IS NULL)
prerequisite.message: One or more A/R Open records (aropen) exist with null Document Dates.

prerequisite.name: Check for valid AROpen Due Dates
prerequisite.query: SELECT COUNT(aropen_duedate)=0 FROM aropen WHERE (aropen_duedate IS NULL)
prerequisite.message: One or more A/R Open records (aropen) exist with null Due Dates.

prerequisite.name: Check for valid AROpen Amounts
prerequisite.query: SELECT COUNT(aropen_amount)=0 FROM aropen WHERE (aropen_amount IS NULL)
prerequisite.message: One or more A/R Open records (aropen) exist with null Amounts.
